Show HN: Outstatic an open source CMS for Next.js
text:
Hi, I've been working on a new project for a couple of months and I'm close to launching it. It is called Outstatic, I created a landing page for it. Sing up to the waitlist to be notified when it comes out.

Features include:

Open source Host for free Keep your data 5 minute setup (5 minutes to live!)

The CMS was built with Next.js and uses Github and Vercel as its main hosting platforms. Full site with examples and documentation coming soon.

Feedback on the idea and the current landing page is appreciated. Thank you!

Ask HN: Research papers reading/discussion groups
text:
I'm looking for groups where people meet, online, periodically (may be weekly) to discuss recent research papers and may be discuss open problems for research.

I'm interested for cs/math topics particularly graph theory and algorithms in general, but all topics are generally welcome.

title: Ask HN: Why should I learn PostgreSQL(MySQL to PostgreSQL switch)
text:
Hi! I want to start a tough discussion: why should I learn PostgreSQL, spend time on that & migrate all my projects to PostgreSQL over MySQL?

Currently, for years I'm fully into MySQL. What makes it worth the time to jump into PostgreSQL? How does it help you? Is PostgreSQL better than MySQL? Why?

What's your experience with that? Is there anyone who switched from MySQL to PostgreSQL and wants to share their thoughts?

How will the Software Engineering be in 20 years?
text:
20 years ago, we were dealing with PHP mainly and the LAMP stack, or JSPs and deploying to JBoss/Tomcat. Today we deploy apps written in any language to containers.

Where do you think software engineering will be in 20 years?
